website_summaries.verdict: The Roxy Reference 230 earphones don't sound great and they may not fit everyone comfortably, but they offer a splash of style for an ultralow price.
pros: The JBL Roxy Reference 230 earphones offer a fun and colorful design and clear audio
A stylish travel pouch is included
cons: The earpads of the Roxy Reference 230 earphones aren't terribly comfortable and probably will not fit all people well
The cable feels weak and is prone to discoloration, and bass response is absent

customer_reviews.title: Fit just outside ear canal
customer_reviews.text: If you have small ear canals and hate those big fat hunky ear buds in your ears you need these. These are by far my favorite ear buds. I use them with my Sansa Clip mp3 player. The sound is great with both music and audio books. I bought these a couple of years ago and they are still going strong with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Gone fishing!

customer_reviews.title: Astoundingly bad ergonomics from an experienced company.
customer_reviews.text: A feat of horrific engineering. Judging by the little purse included in the box, these are made for women or girls. JBL has somehow made a small earpiece unwearable. These feel bad and when they fall out (and they will, even if you're sitting on the couch) it's a relief because they feel so bad. These are marked way down for a reason. If they mark them down to a penny, don't buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Even the losers

customer_reviews.title: ROXY by JBL Reference 230 Earbud Headphone - Orange/Pink are great.
customer_reviews.text: ROXY by JBL Reference 230 Earbud Headphone - Orange/Pink are great. These earbuds were just as they are pictured and provide great sound. We have gotten a lot of good use out of these headphones and I would definitely recommend them. Thank you for reading my review, if you have any questions feel free to email me, I would be happy to help you with any questions you have.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Cowen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Love the color as my husband and son won't be swiping from me!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two.

customer_reviews.title: Roxy rocks!
customer_reviews.text: These are quality earbuds made by JBL they sound awesome and look good too! I got these for my girlfriend and she loves the pink cord it matches her case! The earbuds fit in her ear perfectly and are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: LTandMR

customer_reviews.title: great for smaller ears and kids!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorites! I have smaller ear openings so regular-sized ear buds make my ears ache. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: anne christenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit & Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds! I had bought a pair exactly like this at a superstore.. used them virtually every day for about 2 years, then finally wore them out! I was so happy to find them here. They fit perfectly - the white earbuds that came with my phone are a little too large for my ears. I can leave these in for hours without any soreness from pressure being applied to my ear. The sound quality is very good as well. I like the hot pink - it's easy for people to spot that you have them in, so they don't start talking to you.. :) I ordered two pairs, one for work and one for home/travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G.

customer_reviews.title: ROXY by JBL Reference 230 Earbud Headphone - Orange/Pink
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, great sound in the earpiece so simple presentation, just a little formless to the ear but without inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: DANILO REVERON

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones but not top notch on sound. I use them for my everyday and running.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Roxy headphones, Great Quality for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are great earbuds, super cute colors and they come with a a really cute pouch to keep them nice.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The wire to earbud connection felt a little flimsy to me. But I am kinda rough on earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, big fan of roxy iteams good quality with prime came though the mail ready fast
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working out
customer_reviews.text: I love my new earphones. They are great color and stylish for working out! I would highly recommend them for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Crannage

customer_reviews.title: Who knows? Don't fit
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for bargain headphones and have tried several: ink'd, iLuv iEP322GRN Ultra Bass, ROXY by JBL Reference 230, Maxell 190251 Cool Beans. Panasonic RPHJE120K are on par w ink'd(which used to be my favorite). iluv & Maxell have no midrange. Skull Candy jib are better across all ranges but cost a little more. Can't beat the Panasonics for the price. I couldn't make JBLs fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are a 3$ headphones with a Roxy logo. JBL? Never, these things sound like empty cans. The sound is world's poorest. A damaged headphones sound better than these new ones. DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: galejandrosantos

customer_reviews.title: Love these...
customer_reviews.text: Just got these headphones in the mail. I've already been using them: sound quality is great, and they fit perfectly in my ears. Really comfortable, and they even came with a pouch for storage. The design and colours look awesome. I would definitely get these for a friend!
customer_reviews.author: aozment

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these earbuds. I had to replace them b/c my daughter destroyed the first pair.They are great for traveling and for younger girls.
customer_reviews.author: Chowana Jordan

product_meta.title: ROXY by JBL Reference 230 Earbud Headphone - Orange/Pink (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingROXY by JBL Reference 230 Earbud Headphone - Orange/Pink (Discontinued by Manufacturer

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


JBL® ROXY REFERENCE 230 IN-EAR HEADPHONES - PINK/ORANGE
JBL has teamed with Roxy to produce stylish, high-performance headphones that are a must-have for active young women The JBL® Roxy Reference 230 headphones deliver gread sound with style. View larger 

Roxy Fashion, Meet JBL® Audio. 
The Roxy line has been producing chic womens surf and snow wear since Quiksilver introduced the brand in 1990. From the start, Roxy clothes have been known for the stylish aesthetic, bright colors and exciting fashion that appeal to the young womans active lifestyle. Today, the Roxy collection has expanded to include music, fashion and accessories and JBL audio is the perfect partner for the new Roxy line of bright, stylish headphones. For more than 60 years, JBL audio products have been on the cutting edge of technology that delivers uncompromised sound quality. By pairing world-renowned JBL sound and design with chic Roxy fashion, the JBL Roxy headphones are the must-have for any active young woman when she wants to listen to her music in true style with great sound quality. 


Style, Meet Sound.
The JBL Roxy Reference 230 headphones are lightweight, comfortable and available in two striking color combinations: bold pink/bright orange or brilliant blue/vivid green. But what about the sound? The Reference 230 ear buds use high-performance drivers to deliver high-output sound and excellent frequency response from virtually any portable device. Whether on the beach, in the snow or just around town, with the JBL Roxy Reference 230 headphones your music will rock, and youll look every bit as good as your music will sound 


What's in the Box
One pair of JBL Roxy Reference 230 headphones in pink/orange.
feature_bullets: Lightweight, comfortable fit makes them the perfect choice for everyday use.
Excellent frequency response and high-output makes them the perfect upgrade for virtually any portable device
Bright orange and pink Color delivers high performance sound with style
